thread.title: Mr Colm Connolly
thread.title_full: Big Boys Club reviewed by Mr Colm Connolly

author: Mr Colm Connolly
title: Mr Colm Connolly
text: We had a fantastic time. The girls were loads of fun, the beer was flowing, the games provided great excitement and the finale, wow, what a show. Superb!! The location and food were brilliant. I would definitely recommend Big Boys Club as a bucks organiser.
